info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McDowell, northwestern Rutherford and east central Buncombe Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Marion, or 5 miles south of Old Fort, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Lure, Old Fort, Chimney Rock State Park, Shingle Hollow, Sugar Hill, Fero, Glenwood and Thermal City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
